meanings.definition: Equipped with or controlled by a computer.
meanings.sent1: The new microwave is computerized, making it easy to use.
meanings.sent2: The computerized car navigation system helped us find our way home.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I'd see a computerized toaster, but here it is!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a computerized machine, processing information quickly.
meanings.sent5: The computerized security system kept the building safe from intruders.

meanings.definition: To convert (data) into a form that can be processed by a computer.
meanings.sent1: We need to computerize the sales data for analysis.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to computerize their inventory management.
meanings.sent3: I tried to computerize my messy notes, but it was a disaster!
meanings.sent4: She could computerize any document with just a few clicks.
meanings.sent5: The students were asked to computerize their handwritten essays for submission.

meanings.definition: To control, operate, or process by a computer.
meanings.sent1: The factory decided to computerize its production line for efficiency.
meanings.sent2: They plan to computerize the scheduling of employee shifts.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could computerize my morning routine to save time!
meanings.sent4: The AI system can computerize complex calculations in seconds.
meanings.sent5: The company aims to computerize all manual tasks to improve accuracy.
